title: Rebekah Vardy praises Jamie Vardy marriage amid Coleen Rooney drama
text:
Rebekah Vardy has shared a sweet message to husband Jamie (Picture: Getty/Instagram)

Rebekah Vardy has shared a sweet message to husband Jamie Vardy, calling their relationship ‘unbroken’ and ‘unbreakable’ amind the ongoing Coleen Rooney drama.

Becky took to Instagram on Tuesday evening to share a selfie of the pair, with the two words and a heart emoji.

Her post comes after she broke her social media silence to riff off the Coleen drama by tweeting ‘it’s…… Jamie Vardy’ to celebrate Jamie’s football team Leicester City FC winning their match in mid-October.

The choice of an ellipsis was also used by Coleen at the end of her dramatic statement in which she alleged that Rebekah had been selling stories to newspapers about the Rooney family.

Following Becky’s shady return to social media, she later shared a message on her Instagram Stories.

‘It’s okay to feel unstable. It’s okay to disassociate. It’s okay to hide from the world,’ it read.

‘It’s okay to need help. It’s okay not to be okay. Your mental illness is not a personal failure.’

The 37-year-old added praise hands emojis to the post, and added: ‘For anyone that is struggling.’

Coleen made the accusations on Instagram (Picture: Rex)

Coleen made the accusations on Instagram, alleging that she set up a plot to expose her fellow WAG by only allowing one account access to fake stories she was sharing, and that account was Rebekah’s.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them.

‘It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account,’ she shared on 9 October.

Her statement in full (Picture: coleen_rooney/Instagram)

Rebekah, who is expecting her fifth child – her third with footballer Jamie – has denied all the allegations and called on lawyers to find out who had access to her Instagram and when.

Coleen, a mum-of-four who is married to Wayne Rooney, has yet to post the alleged screenshots.

Rebekah achieved further fame in 2017 when she appeared on I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here!

She and Coleen became pals as their husbands played alongside each other for England.

description: Rebekah Vardy took to Instagram to praise her relationship with husband Jamie.
